item.title: 特朗普对美联储独立性的威胁开始令投资者担忧
item.description:
价值股和收益率曲线显示投资者对宽松货币政策的定价。【原文：

Value stocks, yield curve show investors pricing in easier monetary policy.

item.title: SK 海力士将支付 27 亿美元奖金以缓和劳资紧张关系
item.description: SK 海力士公司的工会批准了一项具有里程碑意义的协议，仅在 2025 年，平均每位员工就可获得约 8 万美元的奖金，从而避免了罢工，并有可能为韩国科技行业开创先例。【原文：SK Hynix Inc.’s labor union approved a landmark agreement that could see each employee on average receiving about $80,000 bonus for 2025 alone, averting a strike and potentially setting a precedent for South Korea’s tech industry.】

item.title: 生物技术领域的最新独角兽利用人工智能挖掘大自然的药库
item.description: 大自然是一位多产的药剂师。阿司匹林、血液稀释剂华法林和治疗糖尿病的二甲双胍都可以追溯到植物，在被现代化学转化为药物之前，它们被偶然发现。【原文：Nature is a prolific pharmacist. Aspirin, the blood thinner warfarin and metformin for diabetes all trace back to plants, discovered by serendipity before being transformed into drugs by modern chemistry.】

item.title: 经济学家预计美国就业报告将再次不温不火，支持降息
item.description: 经济学家们预计，周五的就业报告将延续美国自大流行病以来最疲软的就业增长势头，很可能锁定美联储降息。【原文：Economists expect Friday’s employment report to extend the weakest stretch of US job growth since the pandemic, likely locking in a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 枫叶公路正在洽谈从法国兴业银行融资 2 亿美元事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由加拿大第二大养老基金支持的印度公路承包商 Maple Highways Pte Ltd 正在就通过双边海外贷款筹集约 2 亿美元的事宜进行深入谈判。【原文：Maple Highways Pte Ltd, an Indian road contractor backed by Canada’s second largest pension fund, is in advanced talks to raise about $200 million through a bilateral offshore loan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非财政部长任命税务局副局长为新局长
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，南非财政部长希望约翰斯通-马库布（Johnstone Makhubu）接任南非税务局局长一职。【原文：South Africa’s finance minister favors Johnstone Makhubu to take over as commissioner of the nation’s tax agency, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 三星推出更便宜的 S25 手机和升级版平板电脑
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）发布了一款售价 650 美元的高端 S25 智能手机和一对新平板电脑，这是该公司在其硬件阵容中推出人工智能功能的最新努力。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled a $650 version of its premium S25 smartphone and a pair of new tablets, the latest effort to roll out artificial intelligence features across its hardware lineup.】

item.title: 利率焦虑不妨碍小盘股赚钱
item.description: 由于担心降息对负债累累的企业来说来得不够快或不够深入，小盘股的涨势已趋于平缓。【原文：A rally in small-cap stocks has petered out on concerns that interest-rate cuts won’t come fast or deep enough for the heavily indebted.】

item.title: 英国央行调查显示，英国公司裁员速度为 2021 年以来最快
item.description: 英格兰银行的一项调查显示，英国公司在今年夏天以四年来最快的速度裁员，这表明英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的首份预算案所带来的影响仍在劳动力市场中回荡。【原文：British companies shed jobs at the fastest pace in four years over the summer, according to a Bank of England survey that suggests the fallout from Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ first budget is still reverberating through the labor market.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师看到投资者对美联储独立性的担忧
item.description: 华尔街策略师认为，有迹象表明，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统试图将自己的意志强加给中央银行并推动降息，投资者对美联储的独立性越来越担忧。【原文：Wall Street strategists see signs that investors are becoming more concerned about Federal Reserve independence as President Donald Trump seeks to impose his will on the central bank and pushes for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 多伦多房价持续下滑，买家看到挂牌房源增加
item.description: 由于持续的经济不确定性和库存过剩对市场造成压力，多伦多房价在 8 月份再次下跌。【原文：Toronto home prices declined again in August as persistent economic uncertainty and a glut of inventory weighed on the market.】

item.title: 博通财报迎头撞上 7,300 亿美元股价涨势
item.description: 投资者担心人工智能行业发展势头不振，希望从周四全球最炙手可热的芯片制造商发布的财报中寻找火花：博通公司（Broadcom Inc.【原文：Investors worried about faltering momentum in the artificial intelligence trade are looking for a spark from Thursday’s earnings report by the world’s hottest chipmaker: Broadcom Inc.】

item.title: 美国关税风险加剧，印度与新加坡深化人工智能和芯片合作
item.description: 印度和新加坡周四承诺深化在人工智能和半导体领域的合作，并签署了新的行业协议，新德里正努力扩大与主要合作伙伴的贸易关系，并削弱美国征收50%关税的影响。【原文：India and Singapore pledged Thursday to deepen cooperation on artificial intelligence and semiconductors, signing new industry pacts as New Delhi works to expand trade ties with key partners and blunt the impact of 50% US tariffs.】

item.title: 据说 MTN、Telkom 将与顾问就可能的交易举行会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，非洲最大的无线运营商 MTN 集团正在考虑重启收购规模较小的南非竞争对手 Telkom SA 的谈判。【原文：MTN Group Ltd., Africa’s largest wireless carrier, is considering reviving talks to acquire smaller South African rival Telkom SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国建筑公司陷入科维德事件前最长的低迷期
item.description: 据一项受到密切关注的调查显示，在房屋建筑出现新一轮下滑之后，英国建筑公司正遭遇自大流行病爆发前以来最长的衰退期。【原文：UK construction firms are suffering their longest downturn since just before the pandemic after a fresh slump in housebuilding, according to a closely watched survey.】

item.title: 法国债务销售将在信任投票前测试投资者需求
item.description: 法国自总理弗朗索瓦-贝鲁要求进行信任投票以来首次出售债券，这将考验投资者对欧元区第二高收益率的胃口，以及政治风险加剧的前景。【原文：France’s first bond sales since Prime Minister Francois Bayrou called for a confidence vote will test investor appetite for the second-highest yields in the euro area and the prospect of heightened political risk.】

item.title: 国债波动性上升唤起 "解放日 "记忆
item.description: 由于美国政府财政的不确定性，以及担心周五的就业人数可能会推翻对美联储降息的押注，国债市场波动加剧。【原文：Treasury-market volatility is growing on uncertainty over US government finances and concern Friday’s payrolls number may upend bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 私人资本公司 CVC 称投资者对欧洲兴趣浓厚
item.description: 欧洲最大的私人资本公司之一 CVC Capital Partners Plc 预计，投资者对该地区的兴趣将继续高涨，尤其是在有限合伙人寻求从美国分散投资的情况下。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc, one of Europe’s largest private capital firms, expects investor interest in the region to remain elevated, especially as limited partners seek diversification away from the US.】

item.title: DeepSeek 目标年底发布人工智能代理，与 OpenAI 竞争
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，DeepSeek 正在开发一种具有更先进人工智能代理功能的人工智能模型，以便在这一技术的新领域与 OpenAI 等美国竞争对手展开竞争。【原文：DeepSeek is developing an artificial intelligence model with more advanced AI agent features to compete with US rivals like OpenAI in a newer frontier of the technology, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚新建住房项目减少，未售出住房增加
item.description: 今年上半年，马来西亚新建住宅项目急剧下降，而未售出的住宅单位数量却在增加，这凸显了房地产市场的疲软。【原文：Malaysia saw a sharp drop in new residential housing projects in the first half of this year, while the number of unsold residential units increased, underscoring weakness in the real estate market.】

item.title: 华为发布新款三折手机，展示硬件实力
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. introduced an update to its groundbreaking trifold phone on Thursday, iterating on a novel form factor and underscoring its hardware engineering capabilities.】

item.title: 印度增长，非洲复苏，Sanlam 公司利润创历史新高
item.description: 非洲最大的保险公司 Sanlam Ltd. 上半年利润创下历史新高，主要得益于非洲业务的复苏和印度业务的迅猛增长。【原文：Sanlam Ltd., Africa’s biggest insurer, posted record profit in the first half, paced by a recovery in its business on the continent and surging growth in India.】

item.title: 瑞穗与 Avendus 的印度交易因估值问题陷入僵局
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc.’s efforts to buy a majority stake in Indian investment bank Avendus Capital Pvt have hit a roadblock over disagreements on valuation and the right exit option for the KKR & Co. portfolio company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 市场疲软后华尔街预计土耳其降息幅度较小
item.description: 在土耳其法院与主要反对党之间的摊牌愈演愈烈导致市场大跌之后，华尔街银行目前预计土耳其的降息步伐将放缓。【原文：Wall Street banks are now projecting slower interest-rate cuts in Turkey after the intensifying showdown between the country’s courts and the main opposition party resulted in a market selloff.】

item.title: Blackstone、道富将推出主动型欧洲 CLO ETF
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和道富投资管理公司 (State Street Investment Management) 将联手推出追踪欧洲抵押贷款债务的交易所交易基金，此举正值私募市场寻求扩大投资者基础之际。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and State Street Investment Management are joining forces to launch an exchange-traded fund tracking European collateralized loan obligations, a move that comes as private markets seek to widen their investor base.】

item.title: 简街在印度交易纠纷中令监管机构蒙羞
item.description: 数周以来，印度证券监管机构一直认为 Jane Street Group LLC 正在就其备受瞩目的市场操纵案进行合作。这家美国公司曾要求获得更多时间和文件，以准备 9 月份的听证会。然而，本周三，这家交易巨头提出上诉，令监管机构大跌眼镜。【原文：For weeks, India’s securities regulator believed Jane Street Group LLC was collaborating on its high-profile market manipulation case. The US firm had asked for more time and documents to prepare for a September hearing. Then, on Wednesday, the trading giant blindsided the authority by filing an appeal.】

item.title: 中国罕见的政策磋商引发有关经济和债券提振的讨论
item.description: 中国财政和货币政策制定者举行了一次罕见的会议，这引发了分析师们的猜测，即宽松措施即将出台，这将促进今年的债券市场和经济增长。【原文：A rare meeting of Chinese fiscal and monetary policymakers has prompted speculation among analysts that easing measures are on the cards that will bolster the bond market and economic growth this year.】

item.title: 关税带来增长风险，马来西亚维持利率不变
item.description: 马来西亚维持基准利率不变，因为央行正在权衡近期宽松政策的影响和美国关税带来的增长风险。【原文：Malaysia kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged as the central bank weighs the effects of a recent easing and growth risks posed by US tariffs.】

item.title: 美国就业报告公布前，货币对冲再次变得昂贵
item.description: 夏季过后，货币市场的套期保值成本正在上升，交易员们认为周五的关键性美国就业报告将带来更大的价格波动。【原文：The cost of hedging in the currency market is rising after the summer lull, with traders positioning for wider price swings around Friday’s key US jobs report.】
